func toTermBufFast(str: string): TermBuf {....raises: [ArgumentError, ValueError],
    tags: [].}

Create new term buffer without checking for newlines.

WARN: use only when there is no newlines or escape sequences in input string, otherwise it will look like garbage in terminal.

  Source   Edit
